text: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression.
author: Sally Kirkland

text: Epic poetry exhibits life in some great symbolic attitude. It cannot strictly be said to symbolize life itself, but always some manner of life.
author: Lascelles Abercrombie

text: When you retire, it's a place in life, a part of the journey. You just don't quit work you develop an attitude where you can do what you please.
author: Tom T. Hall

text: When a parent shows up with an attitude of entitlement, understand that under it is a boatload of anxiety.
author: Robert Evans

text: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?
author: Ian Mcewan
